curated_results.title: Data Fetching: getServerSideProps | Next.js
curated_results.snippet: getServerSideProps is a Next.js function that runs on the server-side at request time. It replaces getInitialProps for server-side rendering use cases.

curated_results.title: Migrating from getInitialProps | Next.js
curated_results.snippet: getInitialProps is deprecated in favor of getServerSideProps and getStaticProps. Learn how to migrate your existing code.

curated_results.title: Next.js Data Fetching Migration Guide
curated_results.snippet: Complete migration guide for upgrading data fetching methods including getInitialProps to modern alternatives.
